action.content: Write an XML document describing the release of the latest Google Pixel phone. The document must contain at least three placeholders, such as [price], and you must not use commas in your response.
action.label: context

action.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phone-release>
  <model>Google Pixel 8</model>
  <release-date>September 2024</release-date>
  <features>
    <camera>
      <resolution>50MP primary sensor</resolution>
      <software>Advanced AI-powered camera software</software>
    </camera>
    <battery>
      <capacity>4500mAh</capacity>
      <fast-charge>Supports up to 30W fast charging</fast-charge>
    </battery>
  </features>
  <availability>
    <pre-order>Pre-orders start on September 1st 2024</pre-order>
    <retail-price>[price] USD</retail-price>
    <storage-options>
      <option>128GB</option>
      <option>256GB</option>
      <option>512GB</option>
    </storage-options>
  </availability>
  <specifications>
    <processor>Qualcomm Snapdragon Gen 2</processor>
    <ram>12GB</ram>
    <display>
      <size>6.7 inches</size>
      <resolution>1440 x 3120 pixels</resolution>
    </display>
  </specifications>
  <colors>
    <color>Obsidian</color>
    <color>Snow</color>
    <color>Green</color>
  </colors>
</phone-release>
action.label: response
